rules_text:
Exile target creature or enchantment, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.
Cache the top card of your library face-down. [i](Look at it, then exile it face down. Create a Memory enchantment token with “{2}, Sacrifice this: You may play the cached card this turn.”)[/i]
